name:
@eddie Great post! Its awesome that my approach has inspired you to choose more passive approach whenever possible. I'm still using Swarm for active "check-in" tracking, but even with such a great user experience, I still forget too often. Thankfully, I *also* passively track using Overland, so I can always go back later and fill in gaps if I want to.

Now, we just need to convince Marco to add an RSS/Atom/JSON feed to overcast.fm :)

summary:
Definitely getting a more standard feed would be great. The other thing is if he is willing to make the feed a rolling 2 week window or something it would be an easier load on his servers.
Yeah I’ve gotten pretty good with swarm since it’ll remind me after the fact or I can use the widget to the left of my home screen, but it would be great to not even worry about that.
